dish_name: Grilled Tuna Steaks with Garlicky Lemon Butter Sauce
description: Savor the deliciously grilled tuna steaks paired with a flavorful garlicky lemon butter sauce. This low-carb recipe is quick to prepare and perfect for any seafood lover.

steps.step: Pat the tuna steaks dry with paper towels. Brush each steak with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper on both sides.
Preheat a grill or grill pan over medium-high heat. Once hot, place the tuna steaks on the grill.
Grill the tuna steaks for about 2-3 minutes on each side for a rare (or up to 4 minutes for medium rare), depending on your preference.
Remove the tuna steaks from the grill and let them rest on a plate tented with foil.

instructions.section_title: Making the Garlicky Lemon Butter Sauce

Stir in the lemon juice, chopped parsley, lemon zest, capers, and optional chili flakes. Cook for another 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Transfer the grilled tuna steaks onto serving plates. Spoon the garlicky lemon butter sauce over each tuna steak.
Garnish with additional parsley if desired and serve immediately.
